title: SmithOvilia
author: SmithOvilia
content: Recently joined a smart trading system in coinbase with stable profits, using tokens Tether, investment, which is profitable?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: SmithOvilia on June 09, 2022, 07:44:56 PM   Recently joined a smart trading system in coinbase with stable profits, using tokens Tether, investment, which is profitable?Lol. Coinbase is a fully regulated centralized exchanges, why would you think they are using the AMM mechanism?Your inquiry is not clear, but I think you might have joined a scam. Please explain more about the smart trading system.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: SmithOvilia on June 09, 2022, 07:44:56 PMRecently joined a smart trading system in coinbase with stable profits, using tokens Tether, investment, which is profitable?Just based on your description, I don't even need to open Google.com to know that what you're describing is a straight-off scam. A heavily regulated company in the heart of regulation-land(the United States) isn't going to start such a scheme. Knowing that the government would want control, a non-custodial wallet is probably the farthest Coinbase can go as to releasing a "non-controlling" product.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I can count some ways for you to earn from coins using your cryptocurrency (USDT):Coinbase Earn: learning the basics by watch short videos. Stake Â your crypto: earn up 5% interest but you need to trust them and all your profits may end if price go down deeply (trading is better) Earn up 2.00% APY rewards byholding Dai or 0.15% APY for USD CoinLending: risky and not recommended .https://www.coinbase.com/learn/tips-and-tutorials/how-to-earn-crypto-rewards?__cf_chl_f_tk=WA0H2yoR3Vg1Cpjqu5XvJlzZXUlr3SyoUkwHKES4ekk-1655046966-0-gaNycGzNB30All the methods I mentioned above do not give a guaranteed profit of 20% and therefore they are not profitable, especially if the price moves down.If there is any profit method that is not mentioned in the above link, know that you are being deceived or phishing scam site.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 12, 2022, 03:23:27 PM*snip*This Coinbase feature definitely exist, but it's far different from OP's description of "smart trading system in coinbase with stable profits". I don't think there's anywhere on Coinbase's website that describers their Earn schemes as a "smart trading system", so I'm going to bet OP was almost duped by a scam.
